mapper.select:
SELECT T1.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , T1.CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , T1.CNTR_NO || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR /* 계약번호 */ , T9.ITG_DP_NO AS DP_NO /* 입금번호 -통합입금번호 */
, T6.CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ , T6.CST_KNM /* 고객명 */ , T4.OG_CD /* 지점-조직코드 */ , T4.PRTNR_KNM /* 판매자 */ , T3.SELL_PRTNR_NO /* 판매파트너번호 */ , T1.RVE_CD /* 수납코드 */ , T2.SELL_TP_CD /* 판매유형 */ , T1.OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , T1.DP_DV_CD /* 입금구분 */ , T1.DP_MES_CD /* 입금수단코드 */ , T1.DP_TP_CD /* 입금유형코드 */ , T9.VNCO_DV_CD /* VAN사구분코드 */ , T1.DP_DT AS DP_DT /* 입금일자 */ , T1.PERF_DT AS PERF_DT /* 실적일자 */ , T1.DP_AMT /*입금액*/ , CASE WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '01' THEN (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND FNIT_DV_CD = '1' AND FNIT_CD = T9.FNIT_CD ) WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '02' THEN (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND FNIT_DV_CD = '2' AND FNIT_CD = T9.CRDCD_FNIT_CD ) ELSE NULL END AS FNIT_NM /* 카드구분 */ , CASE WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '01' THEN T9.ACNO_ENCR WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '02' THEN T9.CRCDNO_ENCR ELSE NULL END AS CRCDNO_ENCR /* 카드번호 */ , CASE WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '01' THEN '-' WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '02' THEN TO_CHAR(T9.CRDCD_ISTM_MCN) ELSE NULL END AS CRDCD_ISTM_MCN /* 신용카드할부개월수 */ , CASE WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '01' THEN '-' WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '02' THEN T9.CRDCD_APRNO ELSE NULL END AS CRDCD_APRNO /* 신용카드승인번호 */ , CASE WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '01' THEN T9.DPR_NM WHEN T1.DP_MES_CD = '02' THEN T9.CRCDONR_NM ELSE NULL END AS CRCDONR_NM /* 신용카드주명 */ , T1.DP_CPRCNF_NO /* 대사번호 */ , T3.CNTR_CAN_DTM AS CNTR_CAN_DTM /* 취소일자 */ , F_CMZ_USR_NM(T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID) AS RGST_KNM
, T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID /* 번호-최초등록사용자ID */ , (SELECT X.USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M X WHERE X.EPNO = (SELECT MAX(A1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO) FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS A1 WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(T1.DP_DT,0, 6) AND A1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND A1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN ) AND X.DEL_YN = 'N') AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_NM /* 집금담당자 */ , (SELECT MAX(A1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO) FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS A1 WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(T1.DP_DT,0, 6) AND A1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND A1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN ) CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /* 번호 */ FROM TB_RVDW_RVE_DTL T1 /* 수납상세 */ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 /* 계약상세 */ ON ( T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T3 /* 계약기본 */ ON ( T3.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T4 /* 월파트너내역 */ ON ( T3.SELL_PRTNR_NO = T4.PRTNR_NO AND T3.SELL_OG_TP_CD = T4.OG_TP_CD AND SUBSTR(T1.PERF_DT, 1, 6) = T4.BASE_YM AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_RVE_BAS T5 /* 수납기본 */ ON ( T5.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T5.RVE_NO = T1.RVE_NO AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T6 /* 고객기본 */ ON ( T6.CST_NO = T1.CST_NO AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N')
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_ITG_DP_BAS T9 /* 통합입금기본 */ ON ( T9.ITG_DP_NO = T1.ITG_DP_NO AND T9.KW_GRP_CO_CD = T1.KW_GRP_CO_CD AND T9.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd} /* 판매유형 */
AND T2.SELL_TP_CD IN ('1','2','3','6') /* 판매유형 */
AND T1.DP_DV_CD IN ('1','3') /* 입금구분 */
AND T1.DP_DV_CD IN ('2','4') /* 입금구분 */
AND T1.DP_DV_CD IN ('1','2','3','4') /* 입금구분 */
AND T1.DP_MES_CD = #{dpMesCd} /* 입금수단 */
AND T1.DP_MES_CD IN ('01','02','03') /* 입금수단 */
AND T1.DP_TP_CD = #{dpTpCd} /*입금유형*/
AND T1.DP_TP_CD IN ('0101','0102','0103','0104','0201','0202','0203','0204','0301') /*입금유형*/
AND T9.VNCO_DV_CD = #{vncoDvCd} /* VAN사구분코드 */
AND T1.DP_DT >= #{startDt} AND T1.DP_DT < TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN
#{code} /*조직유형*/
AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /*계약번호*/
AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}/*계약일련번호*/
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS A1 WHERE A1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(T1.DP_DT,0, 6) AND A1.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND A1.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND A1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO >= #{stClctamPrtnrNo} AND A1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO <= #{enClctamPrtnrNo} ) /* 집금담당자사번 */
AND (T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID >= #{stFstRgstUsrId} AND T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID <= #{enFstRgstUsrId}) /* 입력담당자사번 */
